item.title: How to Skip Podcast's Introduction
item.description: Many Podcast have an introduction, if you want to skip it, you can use Pocket Casts (This feature is provided in free version.) Steps: Choose your podcast. Click the gear icon. Input the length you want to skip in the first or last.
